# Use Verbatim Wrapper Style

<!-- == imptr: yaml-snippet / begin from: ../yaml/snippet-k8s-resource.yaml#[min-resource] style: verbatim yaml == -->
```yaml
  resources:
    requests:
      cpu: 10m
      memory: 10Mi
    limits:
      cpu: 30m
      memory: 30Mi
```
<!-- == imptr: yaml-snippet / end == -->

Content after marker is left untouched.
